docs.title: Tutorials > Privacy policy with GPT
docs.plainText_1: Privacy policy & terms of service are mandatory when you set a Stripe account or apply for Google Oauth constent screen.
docs.plainText_2: ShipFast boilerplate includes ChatGPT prompts to help you generate these boring documents in minutes

complexText_1.content: files in the repo to get the prompts. Add your business details, prompt ChatGPT, and you're up & running!
